channel.title: ~~~~Massimo Server BETA!~~~~~~~~~~~
channel.description:
[img]http://i38.tinypic.com/22gsuo.jpg[/img]
Ok i have done alot of changes to my server... it is now online.. and well i have fixed alot...
- All skills work - Custom Client - Working Veng - Working Specials - Over 40 Quest work - Barrows Mini - Fight Caves - Custom Items - Skill capes - 377 Client - God Wars - Fully mapped area - Working Clues ( treasure trails) - Working Premium Members - Fixing Grand Exchange-- - Adding new npc looks from the 508 clients.. - Around 90 npc's with complete Npc dialogue. - Runescape construction, with houses and all - Real Summoning from Rs. - mySQL updated. - Extended link to a world map-- 3D and shows where you are and what is around you.. for Massimo Server only. - Client extended to work with all servers - Over 90 custom weapons - Around 50 full sets of custom armour - And like 80 custom armour items - Adding tutorial Island -------------------
REMEMBER ITS ONLY A BETA PROJECT!!!
i will finish it and release full verson soon!!!!!
here is a vid if u wana watch some of the stuff...
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OR8HLqvvcs4]CLICK HERE![/url]
i will keep this updated everytime i add new stuff!
/CREDITS\
90%- Me for re editing and fixing all glitchs.. plus adding stuff 5%- Bakatool 5%- Dodian
\CREDITS/ Client side---
85%- Me 15%- Galkon for the completely empty client base besides for the class files...--- client.java, frame, GUI, calss8 and class5 was completely empty. =] -------------------------------------------------------------
Dont flam because you have no clue about anything unless you are bakatool or dodian, or josh (galkon).

lol i am working on construction… and working on summoning hopefully get all the stuff added… i practically work 15 hours a day… i am working on it at school and at home… i leave for like 3 hours to hang wit friends…

item.title: ~~~~Massimo Server BETA!~~~~~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

duh^^

and also…

making a runescape source with every last detail could take years… it took then over 2 years to get the game in 3D lol…

and oh well cuz i am in no rush to make a 508… because these are gonna keep going til the client and server is 610… lol i would love to see someone make a 610… where its in a helmet and you do the stuff in real life to like cut trees, kill something, pick something up… lol that would be funny… seeing someone doing that down the street…

and coding dont matter on your age… i am 17 and i have been coding for awhile…

Read full topic

lol… i wana see meh proof of that m8… lolz and ya… i could own u in coding… and to bad im not done… lol after i get god wars finished and g.e fixed then it will be 72% done… and lol it goes up 1-2% depending on how much its gonna help the ppl on the server…[/quote]

Yea yea, You can own me at coding. we all know it

And plus, Making a RS Base isnt that hard.
Im not planning on adding EVERY aspect if my hard drive is in tact, but I was adding the major ones.

P.S. we’ll know this weekend when we go see how much damage is done in houston by the hurricane.
